attributes.action: REVIEW OF BRITISH AID TO PAKISTAN
attributes.additional_details: The Pakistani government and its intelligence agency the ISI continue to export terror . The recent statement in the US Congress by none other than Admiral Mike Mullen is further proof of this duality in the approach of Pakistan. We continue to give huge amount of aid but they continue to adopt a policy which hurts us and our time tested allies . The time has come to put pressure on Pakistan to stop this double game and in order to achieve this link our aid to the Pakistan immediately ceasing to assist terrorist outfits.
